channel.title: Infobae
channel.description: Infobae is a news website created in Argentina in 2002 by businessman Daniel Hadad. Infobae has 450 staff journalists and over a thousand stringers. Their headquarters are located in Buenos Aires. The company also has news bureaus and local editions in New York City, Mexico City, Miami, Bogotá, São Paulo and Madrid

item.title: El día que Maradona conquistó a Nápoles y ganó la protección de la mafia italiana

channel.title: La Nación
channel.description: La Nación is an Argentine daily newspaper. As the country's leading traditional newspaper, La Nación's main competitor is the more liberal Clarín. It is regarded as a newspaper of record for Argentina. Its motto is: "La Nación will be a tribune of doctrine."

item.title: Guerra Rusia-Ucrania. Pandemia v. guerra: ¿cuál afectará más a la Argentina y la región?

channel.title: Clarín
channel.description: Clarín, is the largest newspaper in Argentina and the second most circulated in the Spanish-speaking world. It was founded by Roberto Noble in 1945, published by the Clarín Group. For many years, its director was Ernestina Herrera de Noble, the founder's wife.

item.title: Rusia bombardeó una base militar cercana a Lviv, reportan al menos 35 muertos
